articles.author: Rachel Mcrady
articles.title: Katy Perry Talks Possibility of Returning to 'American Idol' After Exit, Hopes for Her Replacement (Exclusive) - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Katy Perry told her fellow judges to keep her seat 'warm.'
articles.content: Katy Perry has said goodbye to American Idol… for now. The 39-year-old pop star ended her seven-year reign on the hit music competition show on Sunday, saying her goodbyes in a tear-filled episode. … [+3486 chars]

articles.title: 3 Americans among 50 detained after failed coup in DR Congo - New York Post
articles.description: Those who were captured were currently facing interrogation by specialized services of the country’s armed forces, Ekenge, also told Reuters.
articles.content: Three Americans were among about 50 assailants arrested in the Democratic Republic of Congo on Sunday during a failed coup that included an attack at the presidential palace, the African nations army… [+3264 chars]
